mapper.select: select id , agent_id , time , action , order_type , price , coin , fee , amount , exchange_order_id , description from order_history where agent_id = #{agentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_history (agent_id, time, action, order_type, price, coin, fee, amount, exchange_order_id, description) VALUES (#{agentId}, from_unixtime(#{timestamp}), #{action}, #{orderType}, #{price}, #{coin}, #{fee}, #{amount}, #{exchangeOrderId}, #{description} )
